title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item for the first time in library outline view
description: Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item for the first time. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the focus immediately jumps to the library file node instead.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
